FAQ.subTitle: Your Questions, Our Answers: Discover Everything You Need to Know About Rolitt!

FAQ.question2: How does Rolitt understand my emotions?
FAQ.answer2: Rolitt uses advanced emotional recognition technology to read your feelings and respond in a way that's warm and supportive! üíñ
FAQ.question3: Can Rolitt help with learning and studying?

FAQ.question6: Can Rolitt remember important dates or events?
FAQ.answer6: You bet! Rolitt keeps track of special dates like birthdays and anniversaries to help you celebrate! üéÇüéà
FAQ.question7: Is Rolitt suitable for all ages?

FAQ.question8: How does Rolitt learn and improve over time?

About.meta_description: Learn more about our company, our mission, and our vision.
About.title: About Rolitt
About.about-description: Welcome to the world of Rolitt, where technology meets heart!  Rolitt isn‚Äôt just another AI; it‚Äôs your best buddy, designed to bring joy, support, and a sprinkle of magic to your everyday life. Developed by a team of passionate scientists and engineers, Rolitt understands your emotions, learns from your experiences, and grows alongside you.Imagine having a playful companion who‚Äôs always there to brighten your day, help you tackle challenges, and explore new ideas together. From sharing laughs to providing comfort during tough times, Rolitt is dedicated to making every moment special.Join us on this incredible journey as we redefine companionship through innovation and warmth. With Rolitt, you‚Äôre never alone‚Äîlet‚Äôs create unforgettable memories together!
About.mission_description: At Rolitt, our mission is to be the ultimate emotional companion for everyone. We strive to harness the power of technology to create a warm, supportive presence in your life. Through empathy, creativity, and fun, we aim to enhance your daily experiences and help you navigate life‚Äôs ups and downs with a smile!
About.vision_description: We envision a world where technology and humanity coexist harmoniously, fostering connections and enhancing lives. Rolitt aims to redefine companionship by creating intelligent, caring, and playful interactions that inspire joy, learning, and growth. Together, we can explore endless possibilities and build a brighter future!

Timeline.meta_title: Our Company Timeline | Key Milestones and Events
Timeline.meta_description: Explore the journey of our company through key milestones and events that have shaped our history and vision for the future.
Timeline.title: Our Journey
Timeline.description: Discover the key moments that have defined our path and shaped our vision for the future.

event1.title: The Beginning of an Idea
event1.description: Founder AVIVA bought a talking toy for his 4-year-old daughter. While it looked cute, he felt it was just a plastic toy. Inspired by his experience in the internet industry, AVIVA decided to create an AI-powered robotic toy.

event2.title: Forming the Core Team
event2.description: AVIVA recognized the challenges of creating such an innovative product. He interviewed many industry experts and assembled a passionate team. They began developing the Rolitt product in a borrowed office space.

event3.title: Countless Iterations
event3.description: The team tackled embedded development, AI SaaS development, APP,model fine-tuning, structural design, industrial design, website design, PCB design and soldering, hardware debugging, and more. Despite the difficulties, our perseverance led to at least five product iterations.

event4.title: Refining the Prototype
event4.description: Starting is tough, but the Rolitt team stayed committed. By late August, we refined our prototype, marking a significant milestone.

event5.title: Introducing Rolitt to the World
event5.description: With the prototype ready, we're excited to introduce Rolitt. We're committed to ongoing improvements and iterations as we move forward.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.introduction: Welcome to our service. Please read the following terms carefully.

section1.title: Terms of Use
section1.content: By using our service, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

section2.title: Service Changes

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We may collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name and email address.

section2.title: Information Use
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, and to communicate with you when necessary.

CookieConsent.message: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content and offers, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising, and analytics partners. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences and learn more about how we use cookies in our Cookie Policy.
